fr.emn.easymol.geometry
Class Atom2D

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--fr.emn.easymol.geometry.Atom2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class Atom2D
extends javax.swing.JComponent

The 2D atom representation. This class is a Java customized component associated with an atom in a molecule. It can be used as a single button and implements basic drag and drop behavior to move itself as well as the magnetic grid behavior.

See Also:
Serialized Form
